name: Jetpack Adventures
description:
Jetpack Adventures...

Rocket your way through a world full of dangerous and collect as many coins as possible.

This pre-demo features 5 levels. Can you make it through them all?

Please note this is still under heavy development and lots of progress is still to take place if this project proves itself. 

If you like it, or think there is a good change for it in the world of games, please like, comment or rate it in any way.

If you would like to try this inside the browser, please do visit the gamejolt page.

 https://gamejolt.com/games/jetpackadventures/458429
